item.title: Fixing ASIX USB Ethernet on Linux
item.description: This is less of a blog post and more of a note on how I fixed my Anker 7 in 1 (with Ethernet) USB adapter, as the drivers don’t work by default on Linux. First, troubleshooting step is lsusb, it should show you the ASIX Ethernet device after plugging it in: ‚ùØ lsusb Bus 001 Device 001: ID 1d6b:0002 Linux Foundation 2.0 root hub Bus 002 Device 001: ID 1d6b:0003 Linux Foundation 3.
